tool.name: Fill Sinks (Planchon/Darboux, 2001)
tool.description: Depression filling algorithm after Olivier Planchon & Frederic Darboux (2001)<br/><br/><br/>References:<br/>Planchon, O. & F. Darboux (2001): A fast, simple and versatile algorithm to fill the depressions of digital elevation models. Catena 46: 159-176<br/><br/>

param.name: MINSLOPE
param.label: Minimum Slope [Degree]
param.help: minimum slope angle preserved from one cell to the next, zero results in flat areas [Degree]
